entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 except plus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 except plus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15 except 18 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon then northwest 30 gusting to 50. High 15 except 18 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
